description: Stores details about outreach encounters that are linked to one or more Case Management episodes. The CMGMT_* columns store information related to reviewing the case management episodes.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CMGMT_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the case episode which this encounter is reviewing.

columns.name: CMGMT_EPISODE_REVIEWED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the associated case team line has completed their review of the linked case episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CMGMT_EPISODE_CASE_TEAM_LINE
columns.description: Store the line number corresponding to a linked case episode's case team line.
